Title: The Path Opens I
Text:
You retrieved the scroll from Fridli, but it was written in Black Speech, which Layles is unable to translate.

Thurdan is in the Caravan Camp near the entrance to the Flaming Deeps.

Layles suggested you seek out an Elf named Thurdan in hopes of learning what Fridli's scroll would reveal.
CompleteText: Alas, but I have never taken the time to learn the cruel mutterings of the Orcs. I have no desire to speak with them by any means save my sword.
